alert.note: Alert for Brown (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 12:56AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brown County through 230 AM CDT... At 155 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Aberdeen, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bath around 205 AM CDT. Columbia and Tacoma Park around 210 AM CDT. Putney around 215 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
